table.name: vtiger_instances
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_instances` ( `instancesid` int(50) NOT NULL, `instancename` varchar(250) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`instancesid`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vtiger_instancescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_instancescf` (`instancesid` int(50) NOT NULL, host varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, username varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, password varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, dbname varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`instancesid`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
